title: ModSecurity
descriptionMarkdown: This data connector uses a custom agent that reads ModSecurity JSON logs and sends them to Azure Sentinel Log Analytics.

sampleQueries.query:
ModSecurity_CL
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project t=todynamic(transaction_messages_s), TimeGenerated
| mv-apply t on
(    extend file=tostring(t.details.file)
    | project rule=extract(@"([A-Z0-9\-]+)\.conf", 1, file)
)
| summarize count() by rule

dataTypes.name: ModSecurity_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ModSecurity_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ModSecurity_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

instructionSteps.title: Configure ModSecurity
instructionSteps.description:
1. Set ModSecurity to use `Concurrent` logging
2. Set log format to JSON.
```SecAuditLogType Concurrent
SecAuditLogStorageDir /var/log/modsecurity/audit
SecAuditLogFormat JSON```

parameters.label: Create a new file called `modsecurity_agent.json` and copy this template into it
